item.title: About
item.description: I am currently a software engineer at Microsoft. I was previously working at Delphi Automotive/Aptiv in their self-driving division in California. During my time at Aptiv, I made software tools for lidar data visualization and implemented algorithms for allowing HD map based localization. I have patent filings from Aptiv and Microsoft. My interests lie in Software Programming, Autonomous Vehicles, Deep Learning and Mapping.

item.title: Hello 2019
item.description: Happy New Year, everyone! 2018 was a very exciting year for me with lots of learning and experiences. Onwards and upwards to 2019!
